modName: A Daedric Armor Retexture- Flame Plate- HD
summary: A re-texture of the Daedric armor to make it look cleaner while it still maintains it\'s evil aspects. I am trying to improve quality and looks of the Daedric armor and weapon.
descriptionHtml:
{-----Daedric Armor Retexture-----}
                                               \'PLEASE LEAVE FEEDBACK\'
I personally hate how the vanilla daedric armor, which happens to be some of the best looking armor in the game, is only two colors.
--This includes both the female and male versions of the armor.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-Other Mods=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
You can check out the weapons that go along with this mod here - http://skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=5510

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-What is this mod=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
 Puts flame decals on the armor, thee is a mesh and metallic texture running over most of the armor. Added orange and yellow highlights with a chain-mail armor underneath the plate.

-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-Info=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-=-
Please remember to endorse this mod if you enjoy it.

This is a work in progress, give it some time and I\'ll be sure that it gets updated as often as I can.
author: ltceda
